Value: (1) Black Storage Key and Installation Guide for 4 port SATA with Intel® ESRT2 RAID 5

(Black) For C600-based Intel Servers enables adds RAID 5 to 4 SATA ports for ESRT2 RAID 0,1,5, 10. For C610-based servers adds RAID 5 to all embedded SATA ports.Upgrade key to enable ESRT2 RAID 5 functionality on all Intel® Server Boards.
